
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52686855">
<font face="宋体"><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">&nbsp;&nbsp;在windows系统玩游戏或者装一些大的程序常常安装完了才发现运行不了，提示缺少某个依赖的组件，这时候只能去满世界找，有时候还需要卸载了重新安装，非常浪费时间。我给大家推荐的这个软件内置了很多常用的组件安装包，点击安装后，选择需要的进行安装即可，非常实用，分享给大家，希望能帮到大家。</font></font></font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; <img id="aimg_yc6r0" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/gjCbz0h7/1.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/gjCbz0h7/1.jpg"><br>

<br>
包含组件：<br>
Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Redist x86 x64<br>
Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 Redist x86 x64<br>
Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 Redist x86 x64<br>
Microsoft Visual C++ 2012 Redist x86 x64<br>
Microsoft Visual C++ 2013 Redist x86 x64<br>
Microsoft Visual C++ 2015-2022 Redist x86 x64<br>
Microsoft .NET Framework 1.1<br>
Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5（含2.0、3.0） x86 x64<br>
Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0 x86 x64<br>
Microsoft .NET Framework 4.8 x86 x64<br>
Microsoft .NET Framework 6.0 x86 x64<br>
Microsoft .NET Framework 7.0 x86 x64<br>
Microsoft .NET Framework 8.0 x86 x64<br>
Microsoft .NET Framework 9.0 x86 x64<br>
Microsoft XNA Framework 1.0 x86 x64<br>
Microsoft XNA Framework 2.0 x86 x64<br>
Microsoft XNA Framework 3.0 x86 x64<br>
Microsoft XNA Framework 3.1 x86 x64<br>
Microsoft XNA Framework 4.0 x86 x64<br>
Microsoft Visual F# Runtime<br>
Microsoft Visual J# Redistributable Package<br>
Microsoft AppLocale<br>
Microsoft XML Core Services 6.0<br>
Microsoft Silverlight 5.0<br>
Microsoft Visual Basic 6.0 Runtime Plus<br>
– Visual Basic runtime files (v1.0 至 v6.0)<br>
– Visual Basic Extensions (VBX)<br>
– ActiveX Controls<br>
– Dynamic Data Exchange (DDE)<br>
– Open Link Embedding (OLE)<br>
– OLE Automation<br>
– Data Access Objects (DAO)<br>
– Remote Data Objects (RDO)<br>
– Distributive Component Object Model (DCOM)<br>
– Microsoft Data Access Components (MDAC)<br>
– Microsoft Jet (from 1.x 至 3.x)<br>
– Windows Script Host (WSH)<br>
– Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI)<br>
– DirectX Components for Visual Basic<br>
– WinG<br>
– Crystal Report runtime files<br>
– Third-party ActiveX Controls 和 libraries<br>
– Microsoft XML Services<br>
– NTVDM 和 DirectPlay（通过 Windows 功能，仅适用于 Windows 8 或更高版本）<br>
DirectX 9.0c 9.0、10、11<br>
NVIDIA PhysX System Software<br>
Open Audio Library (OpenAL) 2.1<br>
Rapture3D 2.7.4<br>
Adobe Flash Player ActiveX 34<br>
<br>
支持系统：<br>
Windows XP 至 Windows 11<br>
